Module org.autogui
Package org.autogui.swing

Class GuiSwingJsonTransfer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.autogui.swing.GuiSwingJsonTransfer
  • public class GuiSwingJsonTransfer
extends Object
    a class cluster for JSON reading/writing

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.CellValueRowSpecified
      a cell value indicating that it's row index is specified like { "#":123, ...
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonCopyAction
      an action for copying a JSON value of the target component
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonCopyCellsAction
      an action for copying JSON values of target table-cells: each JSON values are converted from each table-column contained as a list of GuiSwingJsonTransfer.TableMenuCompositeJsonCopy and selected based on the column-index
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonCopyRowsAction
      an action for copying JSON values of target table-rows: each JSON values are converted from selected-rows by the context of the table
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonFillLoop
      a table value selector for specified row-and-column indices.
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonLoadAction
      an action for loading a JSON value to a file of the target component
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonLoadCellsAction
      an action for loading JSON values from a file for target table-rows or cells
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonPasteAction
      an action for pasting a JSON value of the target component
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonPasteCellsAction
      an action for pasting JSON values of target table-rows or cells
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonSaveAction
      an action for saving a JSON value to a file of the target component
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonSaveCellsAction
      an action for saving JSON values of target table-cells
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonSaveRowsAction
      an action for saving JSON values of target table-rows to a file
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.JsonTransferable
      JSON transferable supporting string and "application/json"
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.TableMenuCompositeJsonCopy
      a table menu composite for copying JSON values of target table-cells
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.TableMenuCompositeJsonPaste
      a table menu composite for pasting JSON values of target table-cells
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.TableMenuCompositeSharedJsonCopy
      a shared key of table menu composite for copying JSON values of target table-cells
      static class  GuiSwingJsonTransfer.TableMenuCompositeSharedJsonPaste
      a shared key of table menu composite for pasting JSON values of target table-cells
